name: Labyrinths of the World: Shattered Soul Collector's Edition
description: Margaret's soul has been broken into fragments and strewn across multiple worlds. Can you find them all and save her?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1691 MB available space
